Orahochin:

Vidis island over there? There you will find the village of innocent and peaceful Elroki. I can assure you that they are very different from degraded Elrokhians.
I post on the island, only those who cause them harm. Ah ... Did you not look even dangerous. If you want, I'll post you to the island.
